descriptionHtml:
Name: A Wood Elf Archer follower Glaween
Version: 1.1
Date: 18/Mar/2012
Category: Companions
Required : Skyrim
Required : ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii 

Link:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168&navtag=file/images.php?id=10168&tab=3

Recommended: Nexus  Mod Manager
Author: eamico
Source: http://www.tesnexus.com

First of all, I apologize for my bad English.

Introduction.
Since Oblivion, I always desired to have mu custom companions. Unfortunately, my scripting skill was not enough to manage a decent and stable script, so I was forced to use CM Companion Mod to have custom NPC  by my side, helping me in fighting Daedra. I was not too happy, but this was enough for me. Today, I am in condition to do my followers for Skyrim.  I like to share them with community. 
This is one of them. 
I hope you can enjoy travelling Skyrim in good company. 


Description
===========
This mod adds to the Skyrim Gameworld a female Woodelf Archer named Glaween that can be found in Whiterun. She is can be married.
There are 2 versions: Not essential and essential.

Location
========
You can find her in Whiterun. 
In early morning, more or less until 12.00 AM, she will be at the market; after this, she will walk in all City until 8.00 PM; then she will dinner to the Bannered Mare, and after this, she will pass the night in The Drunken Huntsman.
She have this A.I. to try to  gige a little more life to Whiterun.

Details
=======
She have her own Class, as well her own combat style; 2 enchanted bows and a knife in her inventory, and also some money and arrows . All these items will be useful to her and player, if liked. If anyone can remember my Oblivion\'s Glaween Companion, will be happy to have her again.

In my system are installed these mods.

CBBE V3 (standard body) and the hip texture compatability pack:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Bella\'s Better Females version 3:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Cover Eyes (eyes 1 file):
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869

Joseph Anthonys Lip Gloss for Better Females by Joseph Anthony
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13860

No More Blocky Faces by Xenius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=30

Without these mods the look will be different from the look of the screenshots.



Install
=======

I like very much Nexus Mod Manager, it is perfect for me. I suggest to use it, but....your choice.

Pick which method you are going to use for installation:

Nexus Mod Manager Installation
- = or = -
Manual installation 

Nexus Mod Manager installation:
Download the file with Nexus Mod Manager. Activate it. Done.

Manual Installation:
Place the zip file\'s contents into your Skyrim/data folder to install and be sure to activate the ESP and ESM files in your Data Files listing.


Uninstall
=========
Pick which method you are going to use for uninstall based on how you installed it:

Nexus Mod Manager Uninstall
- = or = -
Manual Uninstall

Nexus Mod Manager Uninstall
Open Nexus mod Manager and deactivate the file EAGlaween. Done.


Manual Uninstall

Remove the zip file\'s contents from your Skyrim/data folder to uninstall and be sure to deactivate the ESP and ESM files in your Data Files listing.
----------------


Upgrade
=======
18/Mar/2012 Version 1.0 is the initial version of this file.

Upgrading from version 1: 
It is necessary to remove all items from inventory of Glaween 1 before upgrading to version 1, then deactivate version 1 and activate version 1.1. If you do not follow the instructions, all itms in your inventory will be lost.


Incompatibility
===============
None known.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
If you decide to marry her, it is better to tell her where she can live with you BEFORE she leaves the temple in Riften.
This follower was developed to work with Multi followers, CM Companion Level mod and Ask Follower Skills. Running it with these mods means keeping it clear and bug free.
This do not means that it can\'t be used under UFO;  I haven\'t UFO, so I cannot say what can happen if you use it under UFO itself.
Talking of load order, it is fundamental to run this file AFTER UFO itself, this can avoid best part of eventual problems.
I can\'t see any reason to develop a version specifically to run with UFO. If my files are clear without it, eventual problems are to be considered of UFO itself, not mine. 


You can also download my other mods:

A Breton Witchunter follower Samhair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14686

A Cute Redguard Follower Calypso
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13744

A Nord Warrior Follower Shanya
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12893

A Wood Elf Ranger follower Sharwyn
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15940

A Woodelf Archer follower Cinthowen
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15198



History
=======
1.0, 2012/03/18 - Initial release.
26/Apr/2012     -  Released Glaween 1.1. in 2 Versions, GlaweenNE_1_1 not essential, and GlaweenE_1_1 essential.

Contact
=======
You can find me on TESNexus as eamico
You can send me an email here: eamico@tiscali.it

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to Apachii for ApachiiSkyHair.
Special thanks to Blackie for his CM New Companions mod that includes a top-notch detailed tutorial on how to create Skyrim companions without the face discoloration bug. Get his mod and tutorial (contained in the mod) here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11669Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========
Nexus Mod Manager
Readme Generator - http://lhammonds.game-host.org/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don\'t complain to me if it 
doesn\'t work or your PC blows up.
author: eamico
